name: Chronicles of a Dark Lord - Episode 2: War of the Abyss
name_original: Chronicles of a Dark Lord - Episode 2: War of the Abyss
description:
Chronicles of a Dark Lord - Episode 2: War of the Abyss is a RPG game developed by Kisareth Studios. It was originally released in 2015. Kisareth Studios published the game.
You can play Chronicles of a Dark Lord - Episode 2: War of the Abyss on PC.
